diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AD$ is $x$ units.
The length of the line $DE$ is $9$ units.
The length of the line $AE$ is $12$ units.
Point $E$ lies on the line connecting $A$ and $B$.
Point $E$ also lies on the line connecting $C$ and $D$.
line_instances: The lines $AB$, $AC$, and $BC$ form a triangle.
The lines $AD$ and $DE$ form a line segment.
The lines $AE$ and $CE$ form a line segment.
The lines $CD$ and $BD$ form a line segment.
